analysis.key_quote: Under this proposed rule, it will be easy to target & terminate employees based on political views and claim whatever justification they choose for doing so.
analysis.rationale: The comment strongly opposes the proposed rule by highlighting concerns about politicization, lack of due process, and the erosion of merit-based protections for federal employees. It emphasizes the potential for political influence in employee terminations, which aligns with the themes of opposition.
